game.name: Sniper Clash 3D
game.description:
Preparing yourself to save the pride of your country gives you unlimited happiness and immense pleasure. This girl has also taken many years to train herself for her country and she has now become a secret agent sniper. When she is in her job, a very important mission has come to her. But, this is the first time so she looks confused about how to handle it on her own. Will you come forward to guide her? Join Sniper Clash 3D and be prepared to capture the flag of your enemies like never before!

You are the only brave girl of your base so do no say no to this important mission. Grab your weapon and gear up to dominate the battlefield by implementing a tactical approach! In this fast-paced brand new action game, you have to control a character with the help of a deadly sniper. Seize the trophy relic right from the evil desert nomads and the best part is that you are skilled with enough power. Common boys! Defending your flag from the enemy capture requires lots of courage and hard work.

Your team also needs your support so come forward to lead them to victory after making the maximum number of killings. Rack up the kills, collect your flag to collect the points you ask for in this cool 3D shooting game! Guide your character throughout the battlefield with all the possible powers and weapons you can use and top the leaderboards like a real shooter! Check out other free action-packed challenges on atmegame.com and have fun with your friends!
